pkgmetadata.longdescription: =============================Parsevasp - a parser for VASP=============================.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/parsevasp.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/parsevasp.. image:: https://github.com/aiida-vasp/parsevasp/workflows/parsevasp/badge.svg :target: https://github.com/aiida-vasp/parsevasp/actions.. image:: https://codecov.io/gh/espenfl/aiida-vasp/branch/develop/graph/badge.svg :target: https://codecov.io/gh/espenfl/aiida-vaspA parser for VASP using lxml or fallback elementTree.
